actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that a congressional employee may credit service as an employee of a congressional campaign committee for civil service retirement purposes.

summary.text: Permits a person entitled to an annuity upon separation from service as a Congressional employee to be credited for service as an employee of a Congressional Campaign Committee. States that for retirement purposes such individual may be credited with up to ten years for such service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that a congressional employee may credit service as an employee of a congressional campaign committee for civil service retirement purposes.
